name: DirTy sNow
description: This is my entry for the Bitsy "Snow" jam. It's half baked cuz I got bored, doing all that exits linking. Anyway, I think you can see it's a good plot. Don't bother with the mp3 and the sandwich items, that part of the game is not implemented :(  The pry bar is what you want to find. One ending, quite bleak. Enjoy!
